value.0:
As a follower of a specific deity there will be rites and practices associated with that deity. One thing that is common to all is the requirement to use the appropriate holy symbol when calling upon the deity's power. 

The Holy Symbol for each deity may be different and should be obtained from the appropriate temple. The holy symbol for a ranger or druid may be somthing sacred to the caster rather than a church sanctioned object.

This book contains a list of spells for which a practitioner must have a Holy Symbol equipped. 

In addition there are some spell which require other components. These are usually found in the same places arcane magic users obtain components.

This book is useful for Clerics, Druids, Rangers and Paladins.


Spells requiring Holy Symbol equipped:
<ci i>Aid</c>
<ci i>Bane</c>
<ci i>Bigby's Hand Spells (all)</c>
<ci i>Bless</c>

These spells required a component in addition to the equipped Holy Symbol:           
<ci i>Freedom of Movement</c>:  Leather Thong
<ci i>Planar Ally</c>:  Life Energy (250xp)
<ci i>Raise Dead</c>:  Cut Diamond (5000gp)     
<ci i>Resurrection</c>: Cut Diamond (10000gp)       
<ci i>Undeath to Death</c>: Diamond Dust (500Gp)


The following spells require one or two components but do not require an equipped Holy Symbol. Components marked with (f) are focus components and, like the Holy Symbol, are not usually consumed by the spell. However, there is a small chance a focus component will be destroyed in the casting. 

<ci i>Destruction</c>: (f) Silver Holy Symbol (500gp) - not your Holy Symbol.
<ci i>Cloak of Chaos</c>: (f) Chaotic Reliquary (500gp)
<ci i>Continual Flame</c>:  Ruby Dust (50gp)
<ci i>Create Greater Undead</c>: Graveyard Dirt <c¥¥ >plus</c> a Black Onyx (600gp)
<ci i>Create Undead</c>:  Graveyard Dirt <c¥¥ >plus</c> a Black Onyx (300gp)
<ci i>Gate</c>: Life Energy (1000xp)
<ci i>Glyph of Warding</c>: Diamond Dust (200gp) <c¥¥ >plus</c> Incense
<ci i>Greater Restoration</c>: Life Energy (500xp)
<ci i>Holy Aura</c>:  (f) Holy Reliquary (500gp)
<ci i>Restoration</c>: Diamond Dust (100gp)
<ci i>Shapechange</c>: (f) Jade Circlet
<ci i>Shield of Faith</c>: Bit of Holy Parchment
<ci i>Shield of Law</c>: (f) Lawful Reliquary (500gp)
<ci i>Unholy Aura</c>: (f) Unholy Reliquary (500gp)
